lead_paragraph: Contrary to popular belief, the Indianapolis Colts’ season did not end with a loss to New England. In fact, if not for a late rally by Tom Brady that day and a missed field goal late in a loss at San Diego a week later, the Colts (9-2) — not the Patriots — would be 11-0.
